verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge
nirantara krīḍā kare saṅkīrtana-raṅge

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge—in the society of His pure devotees; nirantara—constantly; krīḍā kare—performs pastimes; saṅkīrtana-raṅge—in the course of His saṅkīrtana movement.
translation: Thus Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu acts in the society of His pure devotees, performing His pastimes and spreading the saṅkīrtana movement.
